document_data.title: Blood in the Water
document_data.story arc:
[[Adventurers League/Dreams of the Red Wizards|Dreams of the Red Wizards]]
Sea of Fallen Stars
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Blood in the Water''''', designed by [[Ashley Warren]] and [[Chris Lindsay]], is an adventure in the [[Adventurers League/Dreams of the Red Wizards|Dreams of the Red Wizards]] storyline published for the [[Adventurers League]]. It is the second part of the Sea of Fallen Stars series.

{{Quote|''An exploration to the underwater city of Myth Nantar leads to a conspiracy, a mystery, and a heist.''{{Cite adventurers league/Blood in the Water|1}}|}}
